name: ECHONNECT
description:
You are not alone!

Search for others, and bring them with you to the exit.

We wanted do bring a Calming experience about finding others around you when you feel alone.

The main mechanic is a finding mechanic inspired by Bat's Echolocation vision, where they send sounds to things around them to locate what they are searching for by their Echo.

Controls:

Click anywhere to Echo

Drag the dots to Connect

Esc to open the Config Menu
